```{r, output=FALSE}
library(PAMpal)
library(banter)
library(rfPermute)
bantModels <- readRDS("data/bantModels.rds")
models <- lapply(bantModels, getBanterModel)
```

## Agenda
- Introductions
- Project overview
- Review models
- Q & A

## Confusion Matrix

### man1

```{r}
plotConfMat(models$man1)
```

### man2
```{r}
plotConfMat(models$man2)
```

### mtc
```{r}
plotConfMat(models$mtc)
```
:::

## Important Predictors
:::{.panel-tabset}

### man1
```{r}

```
### man2

### mtc
